name: TheCanineEscapes
0:
”Alexa, open the canine escapes”
”Alexa, start the canine escapes”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the canine escapes
des:
Listen to this story with a timeless lesson. Are you spiritually bankrupt in life, do you perceive a void as a canine, in this story the protagonist Bailey, finds himself growing canine with psychiatric medicine, till he finds walking on all fours 'normal'. As he joins a spiral of acquiring more and more materialism in self gratification, he wakes up to the knowledge that he is bankrupt spiritually, help arrives early in meditation based psychiatry, instead of a dumping ground for medication. Maybe you would want to reclaim your life and take a spiritual journey to wellness?
 At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill. This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
